// Pseudo-code example:

// Associating Help Text in Form Controls

form
    label.sr-only{Input with help text (sr-only)}
    input.form-control[aria-describedby="helpBlock"]
    span#helpBlock.help-Block{Help text, 1 or more lines}
/form

Help Text in Form Controls

A block of help text that breaks onto a new line and may extend beyond one line.
